long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically grow your Twitter audience by following and unfollowing accounts strategically.This tool helps you attract real, organic followers while keeping your following count manageable.

# Features
🎉Supports background processing
✅ Automatically follow the Followers of a Twitter account
✅Automatically follow the Following of a Twitter account
✅Automatically unfollow users who do not follow you
✅Automatically unfollow users who you are following
✅ Keep a whitelist of usernames to not be unfollowed
✅ Automatically save results to history.
✅ Supports to export follow/unfollow history.
✅ Intelligent error handling.
✅  A well-developed strategy to bypass restrictions


# How to get started?
1. Select task type
2. Enter relevant content.
3. Click the task execution button.

# FAQ
https://pingapps.top/product-detail?app=TWAutoFollow#faq
If you have any problems, don't hesitate to contact us at pingappsteam@tailang.top

# Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers.

# Statement
The extension is designed to reduce repetitive work, you shouldn't and can't send a lot of spam, in which case X will ban your account soon.

X is a trademark of X, LLC. Auto Follow Unfollow for Twitter X  is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to X, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
